About Me

A little bit about me...

BIO

I could sit for hours on my computer, thinking of ways to solve a problem. Only to realize I forgot to save. Coding is my life now, and I love it. I have experience in many different fields such as construction/remodeling, bail bonds, auto glass replacement and teaching 1st, 2nd, and 3rd graders.

First JOB

Teacher

I have been a teacher for the past 13 years. I was a Spanish bilingual teacher for 6 years, then transitioned to the monolingual classroom for another 7 years. I have taught 1st, 2nd, and 3rd grades.

Second JOB

Front End

I have been working with vanilla Javascript, ES6, CSS/SASS and various styling frameworks; I have experience with browser, third-party, and server side API's.

Third JOB

Back End

Along with front end development, I have experience building projects with Node, NPM, and Expressjs.
